holidays.name: Gingerbread House Day
holidays.description: A day dedicated to building and decorating whimsical gingerbread houses, encouraging creativity (and a lot of icing).
holidays.origin: Celebrated in the U.S., inspired by the popularity of gingerbread houses during winter holidays, this day encourages families and friends to come together and create sweet architectural wonders.
holidays.funFact: The tradition of gingerbread houses originated from the Brothers Grimm fairy tale 'Hansel and Gretel,' where a house made of candy lured the children!

holidays.name: National Poinsettia Day
holidays.description: Honoring the vibrant red and green holiday plant that brightens winter homes, National Poinsettia Day celebrates holiday cheer and nature's color.
holidays.origin: This day commemorates the death of Joel Roberts Poinsett, the first U.S. ambassador to Mexico who introduced the poinsettia plant to America in the 1820s.
holidays.funFact: Poinsettias are sometimes called 'Christmas flowers,' and their unique shape is said to symbolize the Star of Bethlehem.

holidays.name: Universal Ninja Day
holidays.description: A playful day celebrating the mysterious and stealthy ninjas of feudal Japan, encouraging fans to don ninja costumes and embrace their inner stealth.
holidays.origin: Created by ninja enthusiasts as a fun unofficial day to honor the cultural fascination with ninjas seen in movies, video games, and folklore.
holidays.funFact: Some kids actually hold ninja training sessions on this day, trying to master silent moves and quick reflexes!

holidays.name: National Ding-A-Ling Day
holidays.description: A humorous day to poke fun at absent-minded people or celebrate the lovable quirks of being a little forgetful or silly.
holidays.origin: Origin unknown, but this quirky observance is embraced as a humorous way to remind everyone not to take themselves too seriously.
holidays.funFact: The phrase 'ding-a-ling' was popularized by comedians to describe someone acting sillily or making little mistakes, and this day gives that vibe a spotlight!
